original_text: who went before you in the way to seek you out a place to pitch your tents, in fire by night and in the cloud by day, to show you by what way you should go.
korean_text: 그는 너희보다 먼저 그 길을 가시며 장막 칠 곳을 찾으시고 밤에는 불로, 낮에는 구름으로 너희가 갈 길을 지시하신 자이시니라

sentences.original_text: who went before you in the way
to seek you out a place to pitch your tents
sentences.korean_translation: 너희를 위하여 장막을 칠 곳을 찾으셨고

sentences.original_text: and in the cloud by day
to show you by what way you should go
